scripts.start: parcel index.html federated_search.html union_search.html refinement_list_operators.html numeric_refinement_list.html geosearch.html geosearch_list_view.html negative_faceting.html dynamic_widgets.html natural_language_search.html --port 3000
scripts.build:instantsearch.js: cd node_modules/instantsearch.js && yarn && yarn run build:es
scripts.build: parcel build index.html federated_search.html union_search.html refinement_list_operators.html numeric_refinement_list.html geosearch.html geosearch_list_view.html negative_faceting.html dynamic_widgets.html natural_language_search.html
